title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: December 07, 2022, 11:05:14 PMLast edit: December 08, 2022, 12:50:36 AM by minerjones
content: 4x Lots of ColdKey cards for auction:LOT 1: Halving3-L.122 + Halving3-R.122LOT 2: History-21.1.22LOT 3: History-21.2.22LOT 4: History-21.3.22**Each card is funded with it's printed face value**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 12th, 2022, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
